comments.body:
Just noticed this. I wonder if SHTOOLS should be GPL licensed since fftw is GPL and it seems this package links against fftw.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GPL_linking_exception

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/SHTOOLS/SHTOOLS
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
